description: This Dart source file implements the 'EventsScreen' widget for a fleet management mobile app. It displays a list of maintenance events with filtering capabilities, CRUD operations (create, read, update, delete), and UI components such as cards, dialogs, and a bottom sheet for editing events.

classes.name: EventsScreen
classes.description: A StatefulWidget that displays a list of maintenance events with filtering options and CRUD operation triggers.

classes.name: _EventsScreenState
classes.description: State class for 'EventsScreen', managing UI state including selected filter, event list display, and interactions such as editing and deleting events.

methods.name: initState
methods.description: Initializes the widget state and loads events after the first frame is rendered.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the UI scaffold including app bar, event list, filter chips, and floating action button.

methods.name: _buildFilterChips
methods.description: Creates horizontal list of filter chips to filter events by status.

methods.name: _buildEventCard
methods.description: Constructs a card widget for a given maintenance event, displaying details like type, description, date, cost, status, and action menu.

methods.name: _getStatusColor
methods.description: Returns color corresponding to the event's status.

methods.name: _getEventIcon
methods.description: Selects an icon based on the event type.

methods.name: _showEventEditor
methods.description: Displays a modal bottom sheet for creating or editing an event.

methods.name: _confirmDelete
methods.description: Shows a confirmation dialog before deleting an event.
